pageContext.name: Brian Holland
pageContext.about: Helped pioneer the classic Motown sound of the 1960s. His songs, including “Stop! In the Name of Love,” “Baby I Need Your Loving’ and “Come See About Me” became hit recordings for the Supremes, the Four Tops and Martha & the Vandellas.
